h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone
content: This boss battle is an interesting one, simply because the giant crystal-embedded statue known as the Mother of Stone doesn’t actually fight you. It doesn’t really move at all, but it has a lot of health to slowly chip through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
This boss battle is an interesting one, simply because the giant crystal-embedded statue known as the Mother of Stone doesn’t actually fight you. It doesn’t really move at all, but it has a lot of health to slowly chip through.
